sentences.sContent: A night on the town may help to break the monotony of the week.
sentences.sCn: 去城里待一晚也许有助改变一周工作生活的单调。

words.tran: 单调的，无抑扬顿挫的；无变化的
单调的；无变化的；产生单音调的

trans.tranOther: the quality of being always the same, which makes something boring, especially someone’s life or work
